abstract: Mark Nelson Paston (born 13 December 1976) is a New Zealand football goalkeeper who most recently played for the Wellington Phoenix in the A-League before announcing his retirement from professional football at the end of the 2012/13 A-League season.
comment: Mark Nelson Paston (born 13 December 1976) is a New Zealand football goalkeeper who most recently played for the Wellington Phoenix in the A-League before announcing his retirement from professional football at the end of the 2012/13 A-League season.
